alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 9:31PM EDT until April 04 at 6:30AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Pulaski and Bleckley Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26 feet, Moderate flooding begins...with several homes surrounded by flood waters and at least 3 homes begin flooding near Gooseneck Lane and RiverView Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 27.3 feet and rising. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM EDT Thursday was 27.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
